name: 辜炳達
objective:
翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵蓋各種文學類型作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in different genres of literature, so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expressions.
schedule:
Week 1: Don't Get Lost in Translation
Week 2: The Bible Without Babel
Week 3: Beowulf vs Yuan Qu 
Week 4: Canterbury Tales
Week 5: William Shakespeare 
Week 6: Exercises de style
Week 7: Moby-Dick 
Week 8: W. B. Yeats 
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: The Great Gatsby 
Week 11: Virginia Woolf
Week 12: Translating the “Unconscious” of Women in Love
Week 13: James Joyce
Week 14: A Clockwork Orange
Week 15: Trainspotting
Week 16: Samuel Beckett
Week 17: Tangut Inn
Week 18: Final
materials:
參考書目
Parks, Tim. Translating style. Routledge, 2007.
Scott, Clive. The Work of Literary Translation. Cambridge UP, 2018.
